Tool

NameDiffuse Pollution Risk
ID4
AuthorCosima Berger, Olaf Conrad (c) 2014
Specificationgrid

Description

Diffuse Pollution Risk Mapping. This tool tries to reproduce in parts the methodology of the SCIMAP - Diffuse Pollution Risk Mapping - Framework. References: Lane, S.N.; Brookes, C.J.; Kirkby, M.J.; Holden, J. (2004): A network-index-based version of TOPMODEL for use with high-resolution digital topographic data. In: Hydrological processes. Vol. 18, S. 191-201. Milledge, D.G.; Lane, N.S.; Heathwait, A.L.; Reaney, S.M. (2012): A monte carlo approach to the invers problem of diffuse pollution risk in agricultural catchments. In: Science of the Total Environment. Vol. 433, S. 434-449.
